sentences.sContent: In such circumstances, governments must do all they can to create and engender trust among its nation’s constituents and institutions.
sentences.sContent_eng: In such circumstances, governments must do all they can to create and engender trust among its nation’s constituents and institutions.
sentences.sCn: 在这种情况下，政府必须尽其所能在它的国家选民和公共机构之间创造和产生信任。

sentences.sContent: Retrospectives on the process and working practices regularly capture the lessons learned by the project and engender a culture of continuous process improvement within the project.
sentences.sContent_eng: Retrospectives on the process and working practices regularly capture the lessons learned by the project and engender a culture of continuous process improvement within the project.
sentences.sCn: 对过程和工作实践的回顾有规律地捕捉从项目中得到的经验，并在项目中造成一个持续的过程改进的文化。

remMethod.val: en + gen(出生) + der → 使出生 → 产生， 引起
